meanings.definition: Save: to rescue or preserve from harm, danger, or loss
meanings.sent1: I will savs the kitten stuck in the tree.
meanings.sent2: Firefighters savs people from burning buildings.
meanings.sent3: The superhero used their powers to savs the city from destruction.
meanings.sent4: Her quick thinking savs the day during the emergency.
meanings.sent5: The lifeboat crew bravely savs the sailors from the stormy sea.

meanings.definition: Save: with the exception of; except; but
